es.uneatlantico.gdbd.reports

Interface IReport

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DOCXReport, HTMLReport, PDFReport, RTFReport

    public interface IReport
    Contains the specification every report must implement in order to be compatible with the application
    Author:
    Alberto Gutiérrez Arroyo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String export(java.lang.String reportFile, java.lang.String exportPath, java.sql.Connection dataSourceConnection)
      Exports the report with the given attributes

    • Method Detail

      • export

        java.lang.String export(java.lang.String reportFile,
                        java.lang.String exportPath,
                        java.sql.Connection dataSourceConnection)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Exports the report with the given attributes
        Parameters:
        reportFile - contains the path to the report file (Usually a .jrxml file)
        exportPath - the path in which to export the generated file
        dataSourceConnection - the connection to the datasource. For example, our SQLite Database, but it could be any database
        Returns:
        the path of the generated report
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if any error happens during the processing
